attributes.action: Train season tickets for part time workers.
attributes.additional_details: A season ticket that allows travel for a selectable number of times per week would be cheaper and fairer.
attributes.background: Many people work part time or work from home 1-4 days per week. A train season ticket is still charged as though everyone works 5 days per week - this is unfair and over charges part time workers.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of train companies, not the Government or Parliament.
